item.title: Follow OpenBangla Keyboard on Social Sites!
item.author: openbanglateam@gmail.com (OpenBangla Team)
item.description: OpenBangla Keyboard is now available on twitter and on facebook. Follow and like OpenBangla Keyboard on social sites to always stay updated! Follow our #facebook pagehttps://t.co/RCfCrUioV8 — OpenBangla (@OpenBanglaTeam) March 27, 2018
